channel.title: Gunz Stat Signature
channel.description:
[img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/5100/gunzronthecon.png[/img]
I'm not sure about the purple text color. It looked a lot better with a black background and I'm having trouble with finding a text color that meshes well with the background. What do you think?
~Ron

item.title: Gunz Stat Signature
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

bowserjr2:

What if you let the users choose color of text, render and background and you get a great sig service.

I did think of that and it’s a great idea but I don’t feel like coding all of that lol. If I find the time sure, this is how I think it would work.

  • A page with a form for the username
  • text box and browse button to find a background picture to upload temporarily
  • text box and browse button to find a render picture to upload temporarily
  • x, y location of render, check if x and y are actually within the width/height of the image
  • 3 text boxes for the rgb values for the color of the text and 1 text box for the html hex color code that can be converted into rgb
  • 7 stats so 7 edit boxes for each of the x and y locations of each stat as well as 7 combo boxes to show or hide a specific statistic because a few people don’t want to show all 7, maybe a specific 4 or 5.

If you guys can think of anything else, that would be cool too.

Nice render sanga, it looks a lot more deadly and in your face than the one I cut out. I’ll try to use it in another picture. And fastballz, for being a moderator of a graphics forum with the title graphics master, everyone else had better criticism than you. Be more constructive and I’ll be able to alter my image so everyone’s happy.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Gunz Stat Signature
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

If you can find a more appropriate and appealing render that will fit in that box, be my guest.

If I’m offering gunz stats signatures, I want more than one signature that people can choose from. Find a better render and I’ll try to make a sig out of it or just replace the current render with yours and save it as sig2.jpg or you can create another signature using the render and I’ll use it in the stat sig process.

Read full topic

item.title: Gunz Stat Signature
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Thanks but it’s a JPEG with the highest achievable quality. I saved it as a PNG before but right now transparent PNGs aren’t supported and transparent JPEGs are. Quality wise, PNGs > JPEGs.

I want transparency for the GunZ ijji text and the unused corners of the image due to the rounded rectangular border. If anyone would like their own stat signature, I will be releasing a webpage that will generate their own.

Read full topic
